group_1.textLeft: ...Mitsune said she'd rather tell you the truth.

group_1.textRight: Does that mean that you two are really@connected to the problem in Takarazaki...?

group_1.textLeft: ...N-no, that's not it.
I was just...afraid...of being seen for who I@really am...

group_1.textRight: Oh...

group_1.textLeft: ...It's embarrassing to act like I'm actually@a hero, isn't it...?
We've only come to Takarazaki so she@could change.
It's got nothing to do with what's going on@in this town.
Th-that's right...I'm just here...to change myself...

group_1.textRight: You want to change yourself...?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...

group_1.textRight: What do you mean...?

group_1.textLeft: Right now...I'm weak...so I want to turn my@fake self into my true self...

group_1.textRight: ...Weak, true self...
Um, can you tell us more about that...?

group_1.textLeft: See, you're still skeptical...

group_1.textRight: That's not it! I just thought that if you need help,@maybe we could help you...!
Yeah, because if you tell us what's going on,@we might be able to do something...
Your real self...and the character you're@pretending to be...

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah, when I'm not being a Magical Girl,@I'm really just a shut-in...
That heroic me who fights Witches is just an act...
...I wanted to change the way I live, by acting@like something I'm not.
So we decided to be active in Takarazaki...

group_1.textRight: That's why you started a social media page...?

group_1.textLeft: "A hero who solves the world's crimes."
Let people think that there's a hero like that@in Takarazaki.
If everyone around her encourages her...
Then, it all might come to her more naturally.

group_1.textRight: ...And the ratio of who I really am to who I@pretend to be will change...
I would be pushed to turn my false, bright self@into my true self.
That way, instead of being the "Mitsune Miwa@who becomes a Magical Girl"...
I would become the "Mitsune Miwa who is@a Magical Girl"...
So I thought I could change...
You mean, the strange situation in Takarazaki is@really just a coincidence...?
Then, what's the reason you're trying to@solve it...?

group_1.textLeft: Solving this would make for great publicity,@y'know?

group_1.textRight: ...So, that's why you traveled so far...
But, that couldn't be the only reason,@could it...?
Why did you not want to be recognized@earlier...?

group_1.textLeft: ...It's like making a high school debut@or a college debut.
It's easier to change who you are when@nobody knows you.

group_1.textRight: I see, you're right...

group_1.textLeft: ...Are you still suspicious of us...?

group_1.textRight: No, we're rooting for you...!

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?

group_1.textRight: I don't have confidence in myself, either,@and I want to change too...
I'm the same way. I'm always screwing up,@and everyone laughs at me...
I wish I could change myself, even if it's@only a little.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, you can change...!

group_1.textRight: You're working so much harder than we are.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
We're always relying on someone else, but...
You two... You two are trying to change with@your own power...!
Hagumun... We need to do our best@for ourselves, too...!

group_1.textRight: You're right, Shigure!

group_1.textLeft: Well, I was a little worried, but it looks like@we're all on the same side, Mitsune.

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah.
